alert.note: Alert for Southern Acadia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 12:01AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL LAFAYETTE... SOUTHERN ACADIA AND NORTHWESTERN VERMILION PARISHES THROUGH 100 AM CST... At 1200 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riceville, or near Gueydan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gueydan, Maurice, Morse, Riceville, Lyons Point, Indian Bayou, and Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
